title: Bill Clinton Blushes with Dr. Ruth | Daily Best of August 30 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Bill Clinton was spotted chatting, laughing and blushing with sex therapist Dr. Ruth in the stands at the U.S. Open, and we don't want to know what they were talking about. Kamala Harris and Karine Jean-Pierre are asked simple questions and give incredibly bad answers. Overweight millionaire pop singer Lizzo claims she is oppressed. Rob Schneider brings the truth during an interview with Glenn Beck. A bull gets loose at a Florida rodeo. And lastly, good news: mullets are back.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
